thread.title: Kim Kardashian camps out for baby shower
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian camps out for baby shower

title: Kim Kardashian camps out for baby shower
text:
Kim Kardashian camps out for baby shower Kim Kardashian camps out for baby shower 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Kim Kardashian was joined by her famous sisters for a baby shower that turned into something of a pyjama party. 
The reality TV star, 35, is expecting her second child with rapper husband Kanye West, and celebrated the impending birth with a Troop Beverly Hills-themed bash. 
She was joined by sisters Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian and half-sisters Kendall and Kylie Jenner, who were pictured lounging around in matching striped pyjamas, sipping hot chocolate at a Beverly Hills mansion. Sips hot chocolate. pic.twitter.com/mZKZSkcg83 
— Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) October 25, 2015 
Caitlyn Jenner also showed she was still very much part of the family as she donned nightwear for the bash, along with ex Kris Jenner, and celebrity pals Cara Delevingne and Gigi Hadid. Even Kim’s young daughter North also got in on the act with her own cute PJs. 
The theme of the shower was based on the 1989 film Troop Beverly Hills, starring Shelley Long as a housewife who takes charge of a group of Wilderness Girls after her marriage breaks up. 
Kim, star of Keeping Up With The Kardashians, had postponed the get-together after sister Khloe’s estranged husband Lamar Odom was rushed to hospital after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. Share article 
Khloe, who has been caring for the former NBA star, took time out from his bedside to be with her family at the party, which also featured mini teepees and cookies in a very luxurious “camp out”. Promoted Stories
